articles.title: Apple Joins AI Data Center Race After Siri Mess
articles.content: Apple reportedly is in the process of placing orders for about $1 billion in Nvidia GB300 NVL72 systems for an AI data center.

articles.title: Mag 7 takes on 'growth as defensive' bias, strategist says
articles.content: Citi head of US equity strategy Scott Chronert joins Market Domination hosts Julie Hyman and Josh Lipton to discuss Monday's "Magnificent Seven" rally in the context of the recent tech trade decline. In particular, Chronert emphasizes a "growth as defensive" component coming into play for the Magnificent Seven. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.

articles.title: Apple iPhone Owners Are Postponing Upgrades, Survey Shows
articles.content: Apple iPhone owners are waiting longer to upgrade their handsets, according to a new study. And that is a negative for Apple stock.

articles.title: Apple CEO Endorses Chinese AI Startup as Company Pursues Local Partnerships Amid Sales Slump
articles.content: Apple CEO Tim Cook praised Chinese AI firm DeepSeek during a major policy forum in Beijing.

articles.title: Apple's AI Pivot
articles.content: Apple is working to bring cameras to its watches. Bloomberg's Mark Gurman explains why the move could improve Apple's AI features on wearables. He joins Matt Miller on "Bloomberg Technology."

articles.title: Apple Just Backed a Controversial Chinese AI--Here's Why Investors Should Pay Attention
articles.content: Tim Cook's surprise endorsement of DeepSeek could signal a major pivot in Apple's China strategy

articles.title: Australia Sees Lower Gross Debt Peak, Small Upgrades in Budget
